g.text: Colorectal (Logical)

The subject of the report. Usually, but not always, this is a patient. However diagnostic services also perform analyses on specimens collected from a variety of other sourcessubject : Reference(Patient|Group) 0..1
The practitioner that holds legal responsibility for ordering the investigationrequester : Reference(Practitioner) 0..1
The diagnostic service that is responsible for issuing the reportperformer : Reference(Practitioner|Organization) 0..1
PreAnalytic
Clinical information provided on request formclinincalInformationProvided : string 0..1
Presence or absence of a perforationperforation : code 0..1 « A code that indicates whether perforation is presentPerforationStatus »
The type of perforationnatureOfPerforation : code 0..1 « A code that indicates the type of perforationNatureOfPerforation »
Whether a clinical obstruction is present or absentclinicalObstruction : code 1..1 « A code that indicates whether a clinical obstruction is presentClinicalObstructionStatus »
Anatomical location of the tumour from a given listtumourLocation : code 0..* « A code that indicates the antomical location of the tumour from a given listTumourLocation »
For synchronous tumours indicate each other sitesynchronousTumoursEachOtherSite : string 0..1
Quantitative measurement of distance from anal vergedistanceFromAnalVerge : Quantity 0..1
The type of operation selected from a listtypeOfOperation : code 1..1 « A code that indicates the type of operationTypeOfOperation »
Type of proceduretypeOfProcedure : string 0..1
The type of anterior resectionanteriorResectionType : code 0..1 « A code that idicates the type of anterior resectionAnteriorResectionType »
An indication of pre-operative radiotherapypreoperativeRadiotherapy : code 0..1 « A code that indicates whether pre-operative radiotherapy was usedPreoperativeRadiotherapy »
The type of course of pre-operative radiotherapytypeOfCourse : code 0..1 « A code that indicates the type of course of pre-operative radiotherapyTypeOfCourse »
Surgeons opinion on the existence of local residual cancer postsurgerysurgeonsOpinionOfResidualCancer : string 0..1
Involvement of adjacent organsinvolvementOfAdjacentOrgans : string 0..1

An indication of whether a new primary cancer or a recurrencenewPrimaryCancerOrRecurrence : code 1..1 « A code that indicates whether a new primary cancer or an recurrenceNewPrimaryCancerOrRecurrence »
Description of regional (local) recurrence or distant metastasesdescribe : string 0..1
Pathology accession numberpathologyAccessionNumber : string 0..1
Other relevant detailsotherRelevantDetails : string 0..1
Macroscopy
The length of the specimenspecimenLength : Quantity 1..1
The site of the tumourtumourSite : code 1..1 « A code that indicates the site of the tumourTumourSite »
Maximum tumour diametermaximumTumourDiameter : Quantity 1..1
Distance of tumour to the nearer proximal or distal "cut end"distanceOfTumourNearerProximalOrDistalCutEnd : Quantity 1..1
Distance of tumour to the nonperitonealised circumferential margindistanceOfTumourToTheNonperitonealisedCircumferentialMargin : Quantity 1..1
The presence or absence of tumour perforationtumourPerforation : code 1..1 « A code that indicates the presence or absence of a tumour perforationTumourPerforation »

Site of tumour in relation to the anterior level of the peritoneal reflectionrelationshipToAnteriorPeritonealReflection : code 0..1 « A code that indicates the site of tumour in relation to the anterior level of the peritoneal reflectionRelationshipToAnteriorPeritonealReflection »
For rectal resections the intactness of the mesorectum must be recordedintactnessOfMesorectum : code 1..1 « A code that indicates the intactness of the mesorectumIntactnessOfMesorectum »
Any involvement of the peritoneum should be recordedperitoneum : code 0..1 « A code that indicates the tumour invovlement in the peritoneumPeritoneum »
If lymph nodes are received, then they should be recordedlymphNodes : code 0..1 « A code that indicates if lymph nodes were receivedLymphNodes »
The number of lymph nodes placed in each cassette should be recordednumberOfLymphNodesPerCassette : Quantity 0..*
The presence or absence of polyps should be recordedpolyps : code 0..1 « A code that indicates the presence or absence of polyp(s)Polyps »
The polyp summary should include the numbers, diameter range and gross appearancepolypSummary : string 0..1

A descriptive or narrative field should be provided to record any macroscopic information that is not recorded in the above standards and guidelines, and that would normally form part of the macroscopic descriptionotherMacroscopicComments : string 0..1
The nature and sites of all blocks must be recordednatureAndSiteOfBlocks : string 0..1
Microscopy
A single selection value list from WHO Classification of TumourstumourType : code 0..1 « A code from the WHO Calssification that indicates the tumour typeTumourType »
The histological grading of the tumour must be recordedhistologicalGrade : code 1..1 « A code that indicates the histological grade of the tumourHistologicalGrade »

The maximum degree of local invasion into or through the bowel wall must be recordedmaximumDegreeOfLocalInvasionIntoOrThroughTheBowelWall : code 0..1 « A code that indicates the maximum degree of local invasion into or through the bowel wallMaxDegreeInvasionBowelWall »

Involvement of the proximal or distal resection margins (cut-end margins) by tumour must be recorded. If the margin is less than 10 mm, the clearance must be recordedinvolvementOfTheProximalOrDistalResectionCutendMargins : code 0..1 « A code that indicates involvement of the proximal or distal resection (cut-end) marginsInvolvementOfTheProximalOrDistalResectionCut-endMargins »

Involvement of the proximal or distal resection margins (cut-end margins) by tumour must be recorded. If the margin is less than 10 mm, the clearance must be recordedinvolvedMargins : code 0..1 « A code that indicates the involvement at the marginsInvolvedMargin-s »
If the margin is less than 10 mm, the clearance must be recordedmicroscopicClearance : Quantity 0..1

The status of the nonperitonealised circumferential margin in rectal tumours must be recordedstatusOfTheNonperitonealisedCircumferentialMarginRectalTumours : code 0..1 « A code that indicates the status of the nonperitonealised circumferential margin in rectal tumoursNonperitonealisedCircumferentialMargin »

In rectal tumours, the minimum distance in millimetres between the tumour and the nonperitonealised (circumferential, radial) margin must be recorded from the histological slidesmicroscopicClearanceRectum : Quantity 0..1
Results of lymph node histopathology must be recordedlymphNodeInvolvement : code 0..1 « A code that indicates lymph node involvementLymphNodeInvolvement »
If lymph node(s) received then the site(s) and numbers of lymph nodes must be recordedsitesAndNumbersOfLymphNodes : string 0..1

The presence or absence of isolated extra-mural tumour deposits is to be recordedisolatedExtramuralTumourDeposits : code 0..1 « A code that indicates the presence or absence of isolated extra-mural tumour deposits.IsolatedExtramuralTumourDeposits »
Involvement of the apical lymph node should be recordedapicalNodeInvolvement : code 0..1 « A code that indicates apical node involvementApicalNodeInvolvement »
For all tumours, venous and small vessel invasion must be reported and its anatomic location specified as intramural or extramuralvenousAndSmallVesselInvasion : string 0..1
Intramural invasion must be reported onintramuralVeinInvasion : code 0..1 « A code that indicates intramural vein invasionIntramuralVeinInvasion »
Extramural invasion must be reported onextramuralVeinInvasion : code 0..1 « A code that indicates extramural vein invasionExtramuralVeinInvasion »
Small vessel invasion must be reported onsmallVesselInvasion : code 0..1 « A code that indicates small vessel invasionSmallVesselInvasion »
Perineural invasion must be reported onperineuralInvasion : code 0..1 « A code that indicates perineural invasionPerineuralInvasion »

The presence or absence of histologically confirmed distant metastases must be recordedhistologicallyConfirmedDistantMetastases : code 0..1 « A code that indicates the presence or absence of histologically confirmed distant metastasesHistologicallyConfirmedDistantMetastases »
The site of histologically confirmed distant metastases must be recordedhistologicallyConfirmedDistantMetastasesSite : string 0..1

The relevant coexistent pathological abnormalities must be recordedrelevantCoexistentPathologicalAbnormalities : code 0..1 « A code that indicates the relevant coexistent pathological abnormalitiesRelevantCoexistentPathologicalAbnormalities »
The polyp details (type, number, polyposis syndrome criteria met etc) is to be recordedpolypDetails : string 0..1

If Ulcerative colitis or Crohns disease is selected for relevant coexistent pathological abnormalities record dysplasiadysplasia : code 0..1 « A code that indicates dysplasia if Ulcerative colitis or Crohn's disease is selected for relevant coexistent pathological abnormalitiesDysplasia »
Record any other abnormalityotherAbnormality : string 0..1
The microscopic residual tumour status (completeness of resection) is to be recordedmicroscopicResidualTumourStatus : string 0..1
The response to neoadjuvant therapy should be recordedresponseToNeoadjuvantTherapy : code 0..1 « A code that indicates the response to neoadjuvant therapyResponseToNeoadjuvantTherapy »
Other Microscopic comments should be recordedmicroscopicComments : string 0..1
AncillaryTestFindings
Mismatch repair enzymes are to be recordedmismatchRepairEnzymes : string 0..1
MLH-1 testingmlh1 : code 0..1 « A code that indicates MLH-1 testingMlh1 »
PMS-2 testingpms2 : code 0..1 « A code that indicates PMS-2 testingPms2 »
MSH-2 testingmsh2 : code 0..1 « A code that indicates MSH-2 testingMsh2 »
MSH-6 testingmsh6 : code 0..1 « A code that indicates MSH-6 testingMsh6 »
Mismatch repair enzyme comments can be recordedmismatchRepairEnzymeComments : string 0..1
Microsatellite instability (MSI) to be recordedmicrosatelliteInstability : code 0..1 « A code that indicates Microsatellite instability (MSI)Msi »
Microsatellite instability (MSI) comments can be recordedmicrosatelliteInstabilityComments : string 0..1
Microsatellite instability (MSI) laboratory performing test and report number can be recordedmsiLabPerformingTestAndReportNumber : string 0..1
BRAF (V600E mutation) testingbraf : code 0..1 « A code that indicates the BRAF (V600E mutation)Braf »
BRAF (V600E mutation) comments can be recordedbrafComments : string 0..1
BRAF (V600E mutation) laboratory performing test and report number can be recordedbrafLabPerformingTestAndReportNumber : string 0..1
KRAS gene mutation (codons 12 and 13) testingkras : code 0..1 « A code that indicates the KRAS gene mutation (codons 12 and 13)Kras »
KRAS gene mutation (codons 12 and 13) comments can be recordedkrasComments : string 0..1
KRAS gene mutation (codons 12 and 13) laboratory performing test and report number can be recordedkrasLabPerformingTestAndReportNumber : string 0..1
SynthesisAndOverview
Tumour stage is to be recordedtumourStage : string 0..1
Tumour stage T is to be recordedtumourStageT : code 0..1 « A code that records tumour stage TTumourStageT »
Tumour stage N is to be recordedtumourStageN : code 0..1 « A code that records tumour stage NTumourStageN »
Tumour stage M is to be recordedtumourStageM : code 0..1 « A code that records tumour stage MTumourStageM »
Tumour stage grouping is to be recordedtumourStageGrouping : code 0..1 « A code that records tumour stage groupingTumourStageGrouping »
Year and/or edition of staging system is to be recordedyrAndEdnOfStagingSystem : string 0..1
Diagnostic summary is to be recordeddiagnosticSummary : string 0..1
New primary cancer or recurrence is to be recordednewPrimaryCancerOrRecurrence : code 0..1 « A code that records whether a new primary cancer or a recurrenceNewPrimaryOrRecurrence »
Description of regional (local) recurrence or distant metastasesdescribe : string 0..1
Synthesis and overview overarching commentoverarchingComment : string 0..1

text.a: Pre Analytic component - information collection prior to specimen receipt at laboratorypreAnalytic
Ancillary test findings are to be recordedancillaryTestFindings
Synthesis and Overview are to be recordedsynthesisAndOverview
